# viewDidLoad()

**Instance Method**

Notifies the view controller that the system added a view to a view hierarchy.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor override dynamic func viewDidLoad()
```

## Responding to view-related events

- **viewWillAppear(_:)**: Notifies the view controller that the system is going to add a view to a view hierarchy.
